name: URLCache
desc: An object that maps URL requests to cached response objects.

items.name: init(memoryCapacity: Int, diskCapacity: Int, directory: URL?)
items.desc: Creates a URL cache object with the specified memory and disk capacities, in the specified directory.

items.name: func cachedResponse(for: URLRequest) -> CachedURLResponse?
items.desc: Returns the cached URL response in the cache for the specified URL request.

items.name: func storeCachedResponse(CachedURLResponse, for: URLRequest)
items.desc: Stores a cached URL response for a specified request.

items.name: func getCachedResponse(for: URLSessionDataTask, completionHandler: (CachedURLResponse?) -> Void)
items.desc: Gets the cached URL response for a data task, passing it to the provided completion handler.

items.name: func storeCachedResponse(CachedURLResponse, for: URLSessionDataTask)
items.desc: Stores a cached URL response for a specified data task.

items.name: func removeCachedResponse(for: URLRequest)
items.desc: Removes the cached URL response for a specified URL request.

items.name: func removeCachedResponse(for: URLSessionDataTask)
items.desc: Removes the cached URL response for a specified data task.

items.name: func removeCachedResponses(since: Date)
items.desc: Clears the given cache of any cached responses since the provided date.

items.name: func removeAllCachedResponses()
items.desc: Clears the receiverâ€™s cache, removing all stored cached URL responses.

items.name: var currentDiskUsage: Int
items.desc: The current size of the on-disk cache, in bytes.

items.name: var diskCapacity: Int
items.desc: The capacity of the on-disk cache, in bytes.

items.name: var currentMemoryUsage: Int
items.desc: The current size of the in-memory cache, in bytes.

items.name: var memoryCapacity: Int
items.desc: The capacity of the in-memory cache, in bytes.

items.name: enum URLCache.StoragePolicy
items.desc: These constants specify the caching strategy used by an CachedURLResponse object.
